text: Asclepias subverticillata (also known as the horsetail milkweed or whorled milkweed) is a species of milkweed plant. It belongs in the subfamily Asclepiadoideae. It is native to the western United States. ==Other websites== *Asclepias subverticillata at USDA PLANTS Database s
title: Asclepias subverticillata
